name: karakeep-homedash
description: Karakeep Homedash is a personal dashboard for managing smart home or server resources. It displays widgets, stats and quick links, letting users build a customized control panel for self hosted services.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Drag-and-drop widgets and personalized layout configuration. Build your ideal control center

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Quick access bookmarks to all your self-hosted services. Navigate your infrastructure easily

features.title: Smart Home Controls
features.description: Integrate with home automation platforms for device management. Control lights, sensors, and more

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Display CPU, memory, disk, and network usage statistics. Track server performance

features.title: Calendar Integration
features.description: View upcoming events and appointments from calendar services. Keep track of your schedule
